channel.title: Devblogs.microsoft.com/Webdev on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Devblogs.microsoft.com/Webdev on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Bing on .NET 8: The Impact of Dynamic PGO
item.description: Bing Extensible Application Platform's upgrade to .NET 8 and how dynamic profile guided optimization continues to deliver performance gains The post Bing on .NET 8: The Impact of Dynamic PGO appeared first on .NET Blog. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/bing-on-dotnet-8-the-impact-of-dynamic-pgo/

item.title: .NET 7 will reach End of Support on May 14, 2024
item.description: .NET 7 will reach end of support on May 14, 2024, this blog breaks down all the valuable information you need to know and how to update to .NET 8. The post .NET 7 will reach End of Support on May 14, 2024 appeared first on .NET Blog. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-7-end-of-support/

item.title: .NET Framework – March 2024 Cumulative Update Preview
item.description: March 2024 Cumulative Update Preview Updates for .NET Framework The post .NET Framework – March 2024 Cumulative Update Preview appeared first on .NET Blog. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-framework-march-2024-cumulative-update-preview/

item.title: Adding Apple Privacy Manifest Support to .NET iOS & .NET MAUI apps
item.description: Starting May 1, 2024 Apple will start enforcing their Apple privacy manifest for apps that are published to the App Store. In this post we'll describe how to navigate this for .NET for iOS and .NET MAUI apps. The post Adding Apple Privacy Manifest Support to .NET iOS & .NET MAUI apps appeared first on .NET Blog. Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/apple-privacy-manifest-support/
